page.title: 14Thurnham
page.content: There are three caravan sites catering for members with touring caravans wanting a farm site. There is a large commercial site called Cockerham Sands Caravan Park where there are 260 static caravans and provision for ten tourers. This site has a clubhouse, shops, pool, and is open from March to October. It is popular with families of all ages mainly from Manchester and Bolton. In Wakes Weeks (traditional holiday weeks), it is very busy. There is also a boating club based at the caravan site.
